CatDescriptText: Possible related articles published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 16, 1955, pg. 11, and May 7, 1955, pg. 1. Portion of April 16 article reads: "'Interlude of Fashions' Earl Wheeler Models to Take Part In Show at Fort Pitt, Sunday, April 30 - ...Entertainment will be furnished by members of the Carolyn Howe Studios, featuring the talented young dancer, Jacqueline Lewis..."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, pg. 11, reads: "Howe Dancing School Members... who took part in recent fashion show given by the Beauty Shop Owners and Beauticians Association of Pittsburgh and the State of Pennsylvania are shown here in one of their mambo numbers.  The group was highly entertaining and added much to the brilliant affair.  The association thanks all participants who tool part in the cabaret fashion show, and trade show, thereby making the event a huge success.  Mrs. Carolyn Desmond, state president; Miss Ida Neal, general chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Howe Dancing School members including Jackie Lewis (Jacqui Thompson) in center, Yvonne Jones (Kemp) on right, and four men in dance costumes, including one wearing calypso shirt and dark pants, kneeling over bongos, in Fort Pitt Hotel, for Pittsburgh Beauty Shop Owner's conference
